text: ā baḷika nim'ma hr̥dayagaḷu kaṭhōravāgi biṭṭavu – kallugaḷante athavā avugaḷigintalū heccu kaṭhōra. Nijavāgi, kelavu kallugaḷoḷaginda cilumegaḷu hom'muttave hāgū kelavu kallugaḷu siḍidu avugaḷinda nīrina dhāre hariyuttade mattu kelavu kallugaḷu allāhana bhayadinda uruḷi bīḷuvudū ide. Nīvu māḍuttiruva kelasagaḷa bagge allāhanu ajñanāgilla
